text: Samsung Pay is mobile payment and digital wallet service developed by Samsung Electronics. It was came out in August 9, 2015. Samsung Pay lets users to make payment in works samsung devices. == History == In September 2016, The person who using Samsung Pay can buy shopping using their eyes. In May 2019, Samsung Pay got 14 million users in South Korea. In December 9, 2024, Samsung Pay started working in Saudi Arabia after Saudi Center Bank agreed Samsung Pay. == Availability == Date Supported countries issued in Available in Samsung Wallet August 20, 2015 September 28, 2015 March 29, 2016 June 2, 2016 June 15, 2016 June 16, 2016 July 13, 2016 June 19, 2016 September 28, 2016 November 8, 2016 February 24, 2017 March 22, 2017 April 27, 2017
